content: Hi Dr. Wilson, I had trouble sleeping last night. Should I adjust my routine?
Hi John! Let's review your sleep diary from last night. Can you tell me what might have been different about yesterday?
I had coffee later than usual - around 4pm. Could that have affected my sleep?
Absolutely! Caffeine can stay in your system for 6-8 hours. Try to avoid caffeine after 2pm and see how that affects your sleep tonight.
The relaxation exercises you recommended are really helping! My sleep quality has improved.
